name: touch_display_lite
description: A light UI for displaying and operating Volumios on a original Raspberry 7" Touch Display, or similar screens.
author: Feng Zhou

volumio_info.details:
Touch Display Lite Plugin


A light UI for displaying and operating Volumios on a original Raspberry 7" Touch Display, or similar screens. Touch Display Lite is implemented with Flutter and aims to be fast, minimalistic and modern..
